page.player.characteristics.title: My profile
page.player.personalization.title: Game preparation
page.player.personalization.description: For a personalized experience, you can fill in the consumption form to play with your own consumption profile. It only takes few minutes.
You will play with the Oil'gre persona otherwise.
page.player.personalization.messsage.dra: It seems you haven't saved your form. Are you sure you want to go back? You will lose all your answers to the form's questions if you validate the return.
page.player.personalization.messsage.for: The form can not be edited because the game is about to start.
The form must be completed to be validated.
page.player.personalization.persona.desc: The tabs below summarize the different aspects of my lifestyle. If you don't have time to create your profile, don't hesitate to embody me!
page.player.personalization-form.title: Personalize my profile
page.player.personalization-form.validat: Are you sure you want to validate your form?

To ensure that the game runs smoothly, your teacher will have access to your consumption data. It will not be used outside the game, nor will it be shared. The only purpose is to personalize your experience during the game. You can go back at any time and choose the OGRE personas' if you prefer not to share your data.
page.player.player-actions.help.action: Here is a link to a card that will help you better understand the implications of this choice.
page.player.player-actions.help.step: You can use your action points to reduce your consumption. You have a limited number, so use them wisely. You can only use them this turn. Be careful, as some actions cost money as well.
page.player.player-actions.action-points:
You cannot perform this action because you have exceeded the maximum number of {{actionPointsAvailableCount}} action points allowed this turn.

If you're still not happy with your choices, you can change them until the end of the turn.
page.player.statistics.title: Statistics
page.player.statistics.tabs.metals.label: Metals
page.player.team-actions.help.action: Here is a link to a card that will give you information on the means of production to help you decide.
page.player.team-actions.help.step:
As a team, you have to decide which means of electricity production should be installed in France by {{year}} to meet everyone's energy needs.

For each means of production, choose and validate the power to be installed. Be careful, only one person needs to validate the value for the whole team.

Each means of production has a nominal cost. You have a recommended budget, which is only an indication. Pay attention to your overall budget.

synthesis.player.achievements-section.de: You have unlocked a lot of achievements during the game!
synthesis.player.general-section.title: General
To stick to your scenario, you will need to spend an average of {{finalMeanTotalBudgetPerInhabitant}} per {{countryInhabitantName}} between {{startYear}} and {{endYear}}, or {{finalMeanYearlyBudgetPerInhabitant}}. This represents a total cost of {{finalTotalCountryBudget}} for {{countryNameWithArticle}} between {{startYear}} and {{endYear}}.
synthesis.player.general-section.carbon-: As a result of your choices, your carbon footprint is {{finalFootprint}}, a decrease of {{footprintReduction}} compared to your initial situation.
synthesis.player.general-section.consump: At the end of the game, your direct final energy consumption is {{finalDirectEnergyConsumption}}, an increase of {{directEnergyConsumptionChange}} compared to your initial situation.
At the end of the game, your direct final energy consumption is {{finalDirectEnergyConsumption}}, a decrease of {{directEnergyConsumptionChange}} compared to your initial situation.
At the end of the game, your gray energy consumption is {{finalGreyEnergyConsumption}}, an increase of {{greyEnergyConsumptionChange}} compared to your initial situation.
At the end of the game, your gray energy consumption is {{finalGreyEnergyConsumption}}, a decrease of {{greyEnergyConsumptionChange}} compared to your initial situation.
Of this direct energy, the part of fossil fuels increased from {{initialFossilEnergyConsumptionShare}} at the beginning of the game to {{finalFossilEnergyConsumptionShare}} at the end of the game.
synthesis.player.general-section.product: At the end of the game, your team choices result in the production of {{finalProduction}} of decarbonated energy, i.e. an increase of {{productionChange}} compared with the initial production.
At the end of the game, your team choices result in the production of {{finalProduction}} of decarbonated energy, i.e. a decrease of {{productionChange}} compared with the initial production.
synthesis.player.scenario-section.title: Scenario
synthesis.player.scenario-section.edit-h: Name your scenario for France's energy future.
Please choose one person to edit the name for the whole team.
synthesis.player.most-impactful-actions-: Here are the 5 actions that had the most impact considering your initial situation.
